name: Fix for SoundCloud
tagline: Seeking fix for SoundCloud Audio Player
body:
### Welcome to Fix for SoundCloud
This is a simple javascript bookmarklet to resolve the issue with seeking / skipping forwards and backwards with the mouse. Simply add to your bookmarks bar and click to remedy. 

You can download the automatic extension/fix here:
[Chrome Extension - Fix for SoundCloud](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/fix-for-soundcloud/jafllddfbmkniiijagaemlaiadakmloo?utm_source=chrome-app-launcher-info-dialog)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
